thread.title: Kiev's Leaky Blockade of Crimea Degenerating Into Banditry
thread.title_full: Kiev's Leaky Blockade of Crimea Degenerating Into Banditry - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Kiev's Leaky Blockade of Crimea Degenerating Into Banditry
text: Bored and unsatisfied over the apparent lack of results in their effort to enforce a food blockade of Crimea, Right Sector militants have begun a campaign to confiscate and destroy the property of individuals making their way into the peninsula. More ominously, activists have also begun making good on promises to begin an electricity blockade. ...
